lead_paragraph: LADIES' FAIR AT JAMAICA.--The ladies of the Reformed Dutch Church in Jamaica, will hold a fair and festival, in Union Hall Academy, on Thursday, October 2d, the same day of the great Agricultural Fair, where they will be happy to meet any of their friends during the day and evening.
